mapper.select: SELECT wocs.id, wocs.`name`, wocs.corp_id, wocs.create_by, IF ( wocs.`create_by` != 'admin', wu.user_name, wocs.`create_by` ) createUserName, IFNULL( wd.NAME, '' ) AS mainDepartmentName, wocs.create_time, wocs.sop_type, wocs.is_open, wocs.filter_type FROM we_operations_center_sop wocs LEFT JOIN we_operations_center_sop_scope wocss ON wocs.id = wocss.sop_id AND wocs.corp_id = wocss.corp_id LEFT JOIN we_user wu ON wu.user_id = wocs.create_by AND wu.corp_id = wocs.corp_id LEFT JOIN we_department wd ON wd.id = wu.department AND wd.corp_id = wocs.corp_id WHERE wocs.corp_id = #{corpId} AND wocs.id = #{sopId} LIMIT 1
